titles.title: Safe Playgrounds Act
To provide for grants to States for enacting statewide laws regulating public playgrounds consistent with playground safety guidelines established by the Consumer Product Safety Commission.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 5/8/2003--Introduced. Safe Playgrounds Act - Directs the Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC) to provide grants to any State that has enacted a statewide law regulating public playgrounds consistent with guidelines in the CPSC Handbook for Public Playground Safety, or any other similar CPSC guidelines.
